mapper.select: select * from plan as p join member as m on m.mno = p.mno where pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert plan_list (pno, eno, setcnt, exec) values (#{plan.pno}, #{exercise.eno}, #{setcnt}, false)
mapper.select: select p.pno, p.mno, p.title, e.eno, e.name, e.link, pl.setcnt, pl.exec from plan_list as pl join plan as p on p.pno = pl.pno join exercise as e on e.eno = pl.eno where p.pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert plan_date (pno, appdate, exec) values (#{plan.pno}, #{appDate}, false)
mapper.select: select p.pno, p.mno, p.title, pd.appdate, pd.exec from plan as p join plan_date as pd on pd.pno = p.pno where pd.appdate = #{appDate};
select p.pno, p.title, pd.appdate, pd.exec from plan as p join plan_date as pd on pd.pno = p.pno where p.mno = #{mno} and pd.appdate = #{appDate};
select pd.pno, pd.appdate, pd.exec, p.pno, p.mno, p.title from plan_date as pd join plan as p on p.pno = pd.pno where p.mno = #{mno} and pd.appdate between #{startDate} and #{endDate};
